conbody.p: Follow these steps to check the translation status of your projects.

ol.li: In Projects view, select the project that you want to examine.
In main menu, select Projects Project Information or click the Project Information button in the Projects view toolbar.

conbody.p: The following dialog appears: Project Information dialog Status view
You can mark one or more languages as translated by selecting the corresponding check boxes and clicking the Mark Selection as Translated button.
Click the History tab to display a list of events associated with the project.
